item.description:
Lots of good food, music, crafts, kids activities, helicopter rides, and more! If you haven't been before, come! It's really fun.

Cranberry Harvest Celebration 

Oct. 8-9.
10 A.M. TO 4 P.M.
RAIN OR SHINE
Admission $5,  $3 for seniors, Children under 7 free. No pets.

  • FMSSF will have a booth at the Cranberry Harvest Celebration this weekend. Our booth will highlight (what else?) the Myles Standish State Forest! You'll be able to buy: 
  • Authentic Friends of Myles Standish State Forest "Rediscover Nature" Tee-shirts in all sizes
  • Custom-designed bluebird nesting boxes at Native Bird Support Group discount price
  • Frank Werny's new book, Hike Plymouth!: Over 70 Great Walks among the Pines and Ponds of Plymouth, MA, and Surrounding Areas, reduced for FMSSF members! All proceeds benefit the Forest.

Bird boxes and Tee-shirts will be $2.00 off with a membership at the Celebration only! 

If you can help out by spending a few hours at the FMSSF booth, please sign up at Doodle or contact Sharl at friends@friendsmssf.com. We'd be very glad to have your help!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a booth at Frogfoot Bog!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Cranberry Harvest Celebration Sunday
